name: Speedy Exit
description:
SPEEDY EXIT
  • Find the exit
  • Exit only opens when you have the correct speed
  • Pills change your speed
  • Enemies change your speed
  • Move with arrow keys
  • Use [R] to restart the level if you can't correct your speed anymore
This is my first time using Godot, had to learn it while making this, so it may be a bit janky! Hope you have fun! Credits Voxel Revolution by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7017-voxel-revolutionLicense: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Additional sound effects by: https://kenney.nl Additional sound effects by: https://zapsplat.com
